text: jo daan, ve is saansaarik jeevan mein karate hain, vo us vaayu ke samaan hai, jisamen paala ho, jo kisee qaum kee khetee ko lag jaaye, jinhonne apane oopar atyaachaar[1] kiya ho aur usaka naash kar de tatha allaah ne unapar atyaachaar nahin kiya, parantu ve svayan apane oopar atyaachaar kar rahe the
